title: shift(<list column>)
body:
```r
DT = data.table(a = list(1, 2:3, 4:6))
DT[, .(a, shift(a))]
#         a       V2
#    <list>   <list>
# 1:      1       NA
# 2:    2,3    NA, 2
# 3:  4,5,6 NA, 4, 5
```

This is described in `?shift`:

https://github.com/Rdatatable/data.table/blob/1a5003bd5e4df68c79218bf6ef831feeb94db876/man/shift.Rd#L29

It's not clear to me whether it's possible to just shift the list row-wise as I'd intended. Is it possible to support this?
